blogPost.excerpt: Hi ProductHunter🎉 Try our AI based estimation tool Engineerforce for software development. You simply input a task you will develop and our AI model will calculate the number of man-hours needed to develop.
blogPost.body: Hi ProductHunter🎉 Try our AI based estimation tool Engineerforce for software development. You simply input a task you will develop and our AI model will calculate the number of man-hours needed to develop.
blogPost.title: Engineerforce - Realize the objective estimation for developer based on AI
blogPost.author: Iida Yoshiaki

localize.description: Hi ProductHunter🎉 试试我们基于AI的估算工具Engineerforce来进行软件开发。你只需输入一个你要开发的任务，我们的AI模型就会计算出开发所需的工时数。
localize.tagline: 基于AI实现对开发者的目标估算。

localize.description: Hi ProductHunter🎉 試試我們基於AI的估算工具Engineerforce來進行軟件開發。你只需輸入一個你要開發的任務，我們的AI模型就會計算出開發所需的工時數。
localize.tagline: 基於AI實現對開發者的目標估算。

next.excerpt: The world is filled with too much noise around China. Meho (“very good” in Shanghainese) is here to help you contextualize China and equip you with hands-on Chinese skills, so you won’t miss out on the opportunities brought by the development of China.
next.title: Meho - Understand and communicate with China like never before!

localize.description: 围绕着中国，世界充满了太多的噪音。美好（上海话 "很好"）在这里帮助你了解中国的背景，让你掌握实际的中文技能，从而不会错过中国发展带来的机遇。
localize.tagline: 了解并与中国进行前所未有的沟通!

localize.description: 圍繞着中國，世界充滿了太多的噪音。美好（上海話 "很好"）在這裏幫助你瞭解中國的背景，讓你掌握實際的中文技能，從而不會錯過中國發展帶來的機遇。
localize.tagline: 瞭解並與中國進行前所未有的溝通!
